cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology on November 16, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 5781, National Wildland Fire Risk Reduction Program Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 190 (Thursday, October 28, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. LOFGREN:
H.R. 5781.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
clause 18 of section 8 of article I of the Constitution.
[Page H6035]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported in the Nature of a Substitute (Amended) by Voice Vote.

title: National Wildland Fire Risk Reduction Program Act
